content: moc sserpdrow leohrefinnej www garter yoke baby cardi a simple little cardi with super speedy top-down seamless raglan construction and an optional i-cord button band use thinner yarn and smaller needles for a smaller sweater or thicker yarn and larger needles for a bigger one just be sure to adjust the length accordingly co 60 project specs knit neck band row 1-8 sl1 k59 size baby 6-12 months begin raglan shaping finished measurements row 9 sl1 k9 m1 pm k2 pm m1 k6 chest=20 length = 10 m1 pm k2 pm m1 k20 m1 pm k2 pm m1 k6 m1 pm k2 pm m1 k10 yarn 3 skeins knit pick 68 sts andean treasure alpaca or any sport weight yarn row 10 sl1 k10 p2 k8 p2 k22 p2 k8 p2 k11 note the p2s create needles us4 3 5mm stockinette raglan details circular needles and dpns repeat row 9 & 10 increasing for sleeves outside markers leaving 2 stockinette stitches between until piece gauge 22sts = 4 in st st measures 3 3/4-inches and 188 sts place the sleeves on holders and continue with the body shorthand row 1 dropping markers as you go sl1 k 27 right front place 38 sl1 = slip 1 st knitwise sts on holder right sleeve k56 back place 38 sts on holder left m1 = make 1 lift bar be- sleeve k28 left front 112 active sts forming the body tween sts from front to back and k tbl row 2 sl1 p110 k1 pm = place marker row 3 sl1 k111 k2tog = knit 2 sts to- repeat row 2 & 3 until piece measures 8 1/2-inches gether finish the body with a garter stitch edge yo = yarn over all row sl1 k111 until piece measures 10-inches from the top bind off on wrong side finish the sleeves pick up 38 sleeve sts round 1 pm at beginning of round k38 round 2 join to k in round k38 continue in stockinette stitch for 3-inches © 2008 jennifer hoel for personal use only rev 11 14 2008 page 2 moc sserpdrow leohrefinnej www add garter stitch cuff round 1 p38 round 2 k38 repeat rnds 1 & 2 for 1-1/2 inches bind of in purl add button band with right side facing pick up and knit each edge stitch on button side k every row for 1-inch and bind off loosely on wrong side add buttonhole band with right side facing pick up and knit each edge stitch on buttonhole side you can skip k every row for 3/4-inch and follow either i-cord or basic garter buttonhole band instructions the button band altogether and basic garter buttonhole band simply garter row 1 k to 1/2-in from edge k2tog yo k to 2 3/4-in from edge k2tog yo k to 5-in from edge k2tog yo k to 7 1/4-in from edge k2tog yo k to 9-in from stitch 5 row on edge k2tog yo k to end each front edge row
